title: Dancing In The Moonlight
lyrics:
[intro - kazoo] | (Dm) | (G) | (C)  (G) | (Am) |  x2
 
We get it (Dm)almost every night
(G) When that (C)moon is (G)big and (Am)bright
It's a super(Dm)natural delight
(G) Everybody (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
[kazoo] | (Dm) | (G) | (C)  (G) | (Am) |
 
Everybody (Dm)here is out of sight
(G) They don't (C)bark and (G)they don't (Am)bite
They keep things (Dm)loose they keep it tight
(G) Everybody's (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
(Dm)Dancin' in the moonlight
(G) Everybody's (C)feeling (G)warm and (Am)bright
It is such a (Dm)fine and natural sight
(G) Everybody's (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
[kazoo] | (Dm) | (G) | (C)  (G) | (Am) |
 
We like our (Dm)fun and we never (G)fight
You can't (C)dance and (G)stay up(Am)tight
It's a super(Dm)natural delight
(G) Everybody (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
(Dm)Dancin' in the moonlight
(G) Everybody's (C)feeling (G)warm and (Am)bright
It is such a (Dm)fine and natural sight
(G) Everybody's (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
[kazoo] | (Dm) | (G) | (C)  (G) | (Am) |  x2
 
We get it (Dm)almost every night
(G) When that (C)moon is (G)big and (Am)bright
It's a super(Dm)natural delight
(G) Everybody (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
 
(Dm)Dancin' in the moonlight
(G) Everybody's (C)feeling (G)warm and (Am)bright
It is such a (Dm)fine and natural sight
(G) Everybody's (C)dancin' (G)in the (Am)moonlight
(Am-single strum) [end]
